name: Notifier
tagline: Clean notifications plugin written in TypeScript with no dependencies
body:
## Install

`npm install typescript-notifier`

## Building

`npm run build`

## Usage

    var notifier = Notifier.setup({
        theme: 'default',
        position: 'top-right'
    });
    
    notifier.get('Hello World', {
        type: 'error',
        delay: '6000'
    });
